name: Light Dark
description:
You have 10 seconds per level to complete and collect all 3 coins. If you die or run out of time, the game resets to the first level and you lose all your points and coins! In this small 10 level platformer, you can control light and dark, revealing platforms and coins. Using quick reflexes, try to collect all coins in all 10 levels before the clock runs out. 

CONTROLS:
A and D - Move Player
W - Jump
Space - Switch Light and Dark

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3
